overview:
Kevin Quinlan is a senior leader in the IT software industry with over 20 years of experience in software, consulting, marketing, operations and financial management. With experience in many vertical industries, Kevin is a customer centric advocate and has provided sales and go-to-market thought leadership and guidance to world class technology companies like EMC, Teradata/NCR, Oracle and Honeywell.

Kevin has been a keynote speaker at IT conferences and a regular industry spokesperson. His strengths are in building high performance teams, leading complex sales initiatives, expanding reseller channels and growing revenues. Kevin now oversees all sales, marketing, strategic alliance activities and is responsible for managing corporate and partner expectations at Apption.
